name: Pörtal 3: Electric Boogalo
description:
Pörtal 3: Electric Boogalo is a game built over, and submitted in partial fulfillment for my EMC Elective 1 (Introduction to Unreal Engine) class. As a parody of the Portal series of games, this game is a 3D Platformer game where the objective of the player is to collect all the keys to move on to the next portal.

Maine menu image credit: Risk of Rain 2 Titanic Plains.
